title: Oceanic Open Ladder - OCE Weekly
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ON2Phho.jpg
Looking to get into the competitive scene but don't know where to start?

OCE Weekly are hosting weekly tournaments from December 7th to January 4th. Your placings in the tournaments equal to how much points you receive to qualify your team into the Oceanic Challenger series.

Want to find more about the Oceanic Open Ladder? find more [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-open-ladder)
---
http://i.imgur.com/SuMitQ3.png

We will be running our tournaments every week from Sundays at 1PM AEDT. It is a Single elimination format and one day competition. Circuit points are given for your placing in each tournament. There is no limitation in the amount of tournament a team may enter.

* **Circuit Points**
1st - 80 pts
2nd - 60 pts
3rd to 4th - 40 pts
5th to 8th -­ 20 pts
9th ­to 16th -­ 10 pts
17th+ - 5pts

 You can find where your team is if you scroll to the bottom of this [link](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-open-ladder)

* **Prizes**
1st - 5x 4000RP + 5x Triumphant Ryze Skin
2nd - 5x 3000RP
3rd - 5x 2000RP
4th - 5x 1000RP

* **[Guide](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rgh_b--VgDYE9EpCwVxocwjnfFsfAIz2mxnbvSDMZkA)**
If you are new to Xfire and need help. This is a guide made by myself.

* **Sign up**
If you do not know how to sign up on Xfire please look at the guide just above.
[OCE Weekly #40 (December 7th)](http://www.xfire.com/tournament/2812)
[OCE Weekly #41 (December 14th)](http://www.xfire.com/tournament/2813)
[OCE Weekly #42 (December 21st)](http://www.xfire.com/tournament/2814)
[OCE Weekly #43 (December 28th)](http://www.xfire.com/tournament/2815)
[OCE Weekly #44 (January 4th)](http://www.xfire.com/tournament/2816)

* **Brackets**
Signing up closes at 1:00PM AEDT. Brackets are released shortly after when an admin publishes the seeding. You will be notified in the "OCE" Chatroom.

* **Rules**
You can find it in the rules section of each tournament. For the public rule set used among all Oceanic Open Ladder tournaments check it [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_Cfe7NjkcJQVDJIM05qSTJaSmc/view?pli=1)

* **Rosters**
A team who makes roster changes will only retain points if they retain 3 of their original core members. Rosters will be locked 24 hours before the commencement of a tournament, once a tournament has been completed teams may make roster changes.

* **Team names**
If a team wishes to change their name an administrator must be notified in order for circuit points to transfer.

* **Contact me**
If you still need help, feel free to email me at Zeforus@gmail.com

Follow us on social media
www.facebook.com/oceweekly
www.twitter.com/oceweekly

Good luck and have fun on the rift, Summoners!

replies.body: Why is it a @gmail and why isn't this posted by a Rioter?
We do not have an OCE Weekly email and this is not a Riot organised event but rather by my group and myself.

Then why did you say "Your placings in the tournaments equal to how much points you receive to qualify your team into the Oceanic Challenger series"

That implies that this ties into the Riot official events they posted about when you are saying it's not Riot organised

EDIT: Nevermind, I just went back to and red Riot's post, and you are one of the third parties who host the open tournament stuff. Such strange format to organise things in, but ok.
